"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55a19ef363687262f50001a9#post_55a19ef363687262f50001a9

Have you seen the entire thing yet? Because a lot of my problems with it can be summed up at the end.

I remember watching it with my family. If there's one thing to know about my dad, it's that he's a conserved, quiet, Christian man. And about halfway through the film, when the room is silent but for the film, he turns to me and says, "Wow, this is fucking garbage."


"@Virgil Stormblade":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55a19ef36368726a140027a1#post_55a19ef36368726a140027a1
